Oi oi oi ! We heard your screams of despair, dear yellow family, and we worked day and night (or at least a few hours) to fix the app so it won’t crash anymore. Did you miss us ? Aw, we missed you too <3

Hey ! Here’s a little update for you : you can now open the profile of a person who added you, directly in the notification center. Easy peasy :)
Your suggestions to improve yellow are very welcomed! You can submit them at feedback.yellw.co :)

Just a little bug fixing, not much! 

Your suggestions to improve yellow are very welcomed! Submit them: feedback.yellw.co :)

NEW:
- You can now choose a Yellow username, which could be very useful for an update to come ;) You can edit it directly in your profile!
- Another cool thing is that now, the notification badges for new friends disappear by themselves, you don’t have to click on each new friend. It was getting frustrating, didn’t it?
- We gave the chat a new style. It looks as cool as you now. 
- Aaaand Great News: you have now an option in the settings to UPDATE your location!!
- Minor bug fix 

Your suggestions to improve yellow are very welcomed! Submit them: feedback.yellw.co :)

Hey folks! New week, new update:
- We take the chat to a higher level with an update you will both hate and love: you can now see when your friend is typing and when they have read your message. 
- New system to avoid the overheating of your phone :)  
- Minor bug fix and improvements 

Your suggestions to improve yellow are very welcomed! Submit them: feedback.yellw.co

We never stop!
- We added a bio on your profile. You can express yourself, share your snap, tell everyone how much you love the Yellow Team (just saying) etc. ;)
- Fix of the crackling in the lives 

Your suggestions to improve yellow are very welcomed! Submit them: feedback.yellw.co

- Restored the "Unfriend" feature.
- Read receipts have been temporarily removed to improve the performance of the chat.

Your suggestions to improve yellow are very welcomed! Submit them: feedback.yellw.co

- "Read" indicator is back in Chat.

Your suggestions to improve yellow are very welcomed! Submit them: feedback.yellw.co

- Bug fixes

What's new? 
- Now you can delete a message in a conversation. Just do a long press on the message and click on "Delete" 
- Try to write :) in a message and see what happens
- Big fixes 

If you have ideas or feedback, please go on feedback.yellw.co. We read all the messages!

Improves reliability of LIVE feature.

If you have ideas or feedback, please go on feedback.yellw.co. We read all the messages!

- Now you can send photos in Chat.
- Now you can mute sound when watching a live.
- Now you can access the list of blocked users and unblock any if needed.

If you have ideas or feedback, please go on feedback.yellw.co. We read all the messages!

- You can now choose the countries from which you want to see the live. Pick as many as you want, you can even choose worldwide.
- You have now a connectivity indicator.
- You can now mute the microphone while doing a live.
- Bug fix.

Ideas? Suggestions? Go at feedback.yellw.co ;)
Some amazing bug fixes! Can you find them?

- No more echo in LIVE
- Many bug fixes

In this new update: 
- We fixed the bug that caused some echo 
- Few bug fixes 
- you can stop the camera during a live

- Lots of bug fixes 
- New features for groups: you can search for groups, choose admins, make them private OR public. 
- We made some translations for your Brazilian and Spanish friends :)

- Tap to the left side of a profile picture to go to the previous one

Hey! 

Many of you already know that since we asked for your opinion a while ago. It’s finally happening, Yellow is changing name. We listened to you and picked a name you like overwhelmingly. 
And the new name is… *drum roll* ...  

YUBO!!
It’s the same app, just a different name. We hope you will like it as much as we do. 

The Yubo Team

Guys this time, this is not just an update with bug fixes, we added something new, something you have all been waiting for: 

Filters available when streaming !!!! We promise you, it’s true. Just hit the « go live » button to try it out. Also, we have improved the UI of the side bar during live streams because we all know (the white section) that light hurts your eyes when it gets late at night.

Keep involved with the community, follow us on our social medias, stay in touch as we are always open for your feedback. Much love Yubo community.

In this latest version, we rebuilt from scratch a new experience of the chat on Yubo.
Sending messages and talking to your new friends has never been easier! Thanks to this more reliable, smoothier and faster messaging experience, we will also be able to add new features you would like to see.
Tell us in the reviews what new features you would like!
We hope you will enjoy this new version!
Team Yubo

In this latest version, we fixed many crashes, especially when the app was in background.
We also make it easier for you to report comments in live streams. It will really help us improve moderation and get your feedback faster!
We hope you will enjoy this new version!
Team Yubo

Today, we are introducing a new feature: Raise your hand. We made it easier to ask to join a live broadcast. We hope you will love it!
In the version we also made a lot of bug fix to make your experience even smoother on the app. 
We hope you will enjoy this new version!
Team Yubo
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

We are always working to make the app better and provide you with the best possible experience. 

Bugs fixes and improvements in this version include enhancement of live streaming performances. 

Love the app? Rate us! 
Enjoy your new update <3

---> Now you can boost your live video or your friends' lives to bring more people and discover new friends! Tell us what you think :) 
Happy friending!

Hey! In this new update, we restyled the live streaming’s feed with a new design :D 

- We now show up to 8 streamers' pictures for each live 
- You can easily see what live your friends are watching and which ones are streaming.
- On the top are the trending live, swipe right to see them all.
- The page is also muuuuch more fluid (try to scroll fast and see by yourself!)
- We also fixed some bugs :)

Spring has sprung, time for us to do a major in-app « housecleaning »! Lot of bug fixes and improvements, including:

* ‘seen’ and typing optimization within the chat

Enjoy this new update and keep letting us know your thoughts. We love receiving feedback from you <3

Hey! yubo is getting better and better every week… 
Discover 2 new features that will boost your experience on the app:
* Best friends feature: ‘star’ your 20 best friends so as to showcase their streams within the app
* Record feature: record the best moments of your streams (you need to be a streamer) and share them on your social networks 

Enjoy this new update and keep letting us know your thoughts. We love receiving feedback from you <3

The best update any update has ever updated!
Lot of bug fixes and improvements, including a new profile design:
- Yes, we’ve heard you: we’ve reintroduced the friends’ list so you can see how many friends you have!
- Now you also can reorder easily your profile pictures and find all the relevant information at the same place. 

Enjoy this new update and keep letting us know your thoughts. We love receiving feedback from you <3

Hey! Another update that’s still the best update any update has updated.

- Dear German and Norwegian users, the app is now available in your language!
Enjoy this new update and keep letting us know your thoughts. We love receiving feedback from you <3

Hey! It’s time for a splashy new update!
Upgrade to the Power Pack and enjoy new possibilities on the app:
- Find out who swiped right on you and get new friends right away
- Increase your visibility and meet much more people within 30 minutes thanks to the Turbo
- Do you want to catch the attention of the people you like? Use your Super Friend Requests and make new friends easily
- Undo your last swipe if you accidentally swiped on someone

Don't wait any longer and subscribe to the Power Pack now!
And don't forget to let us know your thoughts, we love receiving feedback from you <3

Happy Pride! Here at Yubo, we love our LGBTQ+ community and want to help celebrate and support them! Check out our limited-time Pride Month update to our popular TBH game - 150 questions to help spark fun conversations with your friends!

Here in the Yubo Community, all are welcome - but unfortunately, that isn’t true everywhere. In solidarity with the Black Lives Matter movement, we are temporarily updating our logo while continuing to listen and learn from our users on how to develop a more inclusive environment. 

We are also making it easier than ever to meet friends and find interesting streams! Update your app to see new Live Feed sections - now you can locate streams playing games, hosted by one streamer, and even go international! 

We would love to hear your thoughts and feedback -  DM us on Instagram @yubo_app, or email us at support@yubo.live!

Yubo TV is available to all community members with 10 minutes or more of streaming time!

We’re super pumped to announce the launch of Trivia Party, the first friendly competition on Yubo! To give it a try, you just have to click on the new “Trivia” tab and gather your friends in a live room, or simply choose to join a room randomly to start playing. Pick the correct answer with your team for a chance to make it to the leaderboard and earn exclusive prizes!

We’re super pumped to announce the launch of Trivia Party, the first friendly competition on Yubo! To give it a try, you just have to click on the new “Trivia” tab and gather your friends in a live room, or simply choose to join a room randomly to start playing. Pick the correct answer with your team for a chance to make it to the leaderboard and earn exclusive prizes!

Introducing YuBucks, Yubo’s official currency! 
•Get YuBucks to spend on Powers like the Boost, Spotlight, Turbo, and Fast Add. 
•YuBucks are available in 5 different Fun Packs—the bigger the pack, the more you save!
Look out for this and other cool features that make it fast and easy to find friends!

Have you ever wanted to introduce your friends to new people on Yubo? With the new profile sharing feature in this release, it’s as easy as copying and pasting a link! Just find two people that you think would get along as friends, and share the links to their profiles!

YuBucks are now available in packs as well as a monthly subscription!
• There are packs of 500; 1,200; 2,500; 6,500; and 10,000.
• The bigger the pack, the more you save!
• Or subscribe to the monthly pack and get 2,000 YuBucks every week.
Finding friends just got a lot more fun—thanks to YuBucks!

In this release, we’ve refreshed the sign-up so that it matches our new look and feel. Now it will be clear that when you create a Yubo account, you’ll make quality friendships in a safe, fun, and easy environment.

Just in time for Pride Month, people who identify as non-binary will now be able to choose a non-binary gender when signing up. We’re always trying to make Yubo more inclusive, and this new feature will give people of all genders the visibility and recognition they deserve. In the future, we hope to do even more for our non-binary friends, like allowing them to select non-binary pronouns. This is just the beginning!

Welcome to the Boost League!
You know what it takes to move your live to the top—Boosts! But how many Boosts do you need? With this release, you’ll now know exactly how many Boosts you need to move your live all the way to the top. You’ll also be able to check the Boost League leaderboard to see the top boosted lives in real time. It's going to be fun, so get ready, get set, and boost!

There are two exciting feature announcements this week. 
First, get ready for Pixels, collectible digital art that you can send to your friends. Pixels are the cool and creative way to say: Yo!, LOL, whaaaa? huzzah!, OMG and more.
These first-edition Pixels will only be available for a limited time, and they were inspired by the personality, style and attitude of real friends like you. So check it out! Send a Pixel to someone who’s on your mind, or start your own collection.

The other new feature that’s ready this week is Muted Words.
Everyone has a word or two that they’d rather not hear. For some people it’s “moist”, for others, it’s “phlegm” or “ointment”. Whatever word makes you cringe, Yubo has a new feature that allows you to mute words that you don’t want to see when you’re streaming live. Just add a word to your Muted Words list, and we’ll block all messages in lives that contain the word. 
Enjoy!

Now you can import your contacts, and add or invite whoever you want.

It's easy:
• Enable access to Contacts in Settings
• Then select Import Contacts
• See who’s already on Yubo, and add or invite whoever you want! 
   
You can earn up to 5,000 YuBucks by inviting people, so don't be shy! Let's see how many of your friends are already on Yubo! Enjoy!

Looking for friends who like what you like? Now finding friends who share your interests is as easy as tapping a tag. Simply select a tag like “Basketball,” “Oreos,” “Astrology” or “Debate” and view the people who like it. Then add anyone you'd like to be friends with. Easy, right?

And btw, why not add tags to your profile to show what you're into? That way people will see your profile more often.

Add friends by tag, and get ready to make some cool connections!
